metadata.title: CVE-2016-7505 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was observed in divby function of ArtifexSoftware, Inc. MuJS before 8c805b4eb19cf2af689c860b77e6111d2ee439d5. Asuccessful exploitation of this issue can lead to code execution or denialof service condition.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
